**Title:** Repair, Maintenance and Replacement of HVAC Systems for Research and Development Centre in London

**Notice of Standing Offer Solicitation**

To: Contractors and Service Providers

The following solicitation is seeking suitable service providers to establish and hold a Standing Offer under the conditions outlined below.

**Solicitation Details:**

* Solicitation Reference: 01B46-22-071
* Publication Date: August 31, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: October 11, 2022 at 14:00 hours EST
* Period of the Standing Offer: From award until March 31, 2023, with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods
* Total Estimated Budget for the Standing Offer: $75,000 for the basic year, with a maximum of $525,000 for the entire period

The Government of Canada, represented by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is seeking three (3) Departmental Individual Standing Offer (DISO) agreements with qualified contractors to provide heating, ventilation, and air conditioning systems (HVAC) repair, maintenance, and replacement services at the London Research and Development Centre in Ontario.

**Scope of Work:**

The selected contractors will be required to perform work as outlined in the Annex A Statement of Work, on an "as and when requested basis" on behalf of the Research and Development Centre.

**Eligibility Requirements:**

To be considered, contractors must have the necessary qualifications and expertise to perform the work outlined in the Annex A Statement of Work. All bidder's information must be submitted through the BuyandSell service provider's platform.

**Site Visit:**

Although not mandatory, contractors are encouraged to visit the work site. A site visit will be held on September 14, 2022, at 10:00 a.m. local time at the London Research and Development Centre. Participants will be required to sign an attendance form.

**Evaluation:**

The contractor's proposal will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical qualifications of the contractor
* Relevant experience and qualifications of personnel
* Expertise in performing work related to HVAC systems
* Financial qualifications and ability to fulfill the contract

**Proposal Submission:**

Tenders must be submitted by email to the agent of contracts at the following address:

aafc.escprocurement-cseapprovisionnement.aac@agr.gc.ca

Tenders must include the proposal, any references, and all supporting documentation. All inquires and requests for information must be addressed to the agent
